tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE ProjectSchedule (
  project_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  project_name STRING,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  team_members ARRAY<STRING>
)

CREATE TABLE team_schedules (
    schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_id INT,
    team_member VARCHAR(255),
    task_description TEXT,
    start_time TIME,
    end_time TIME,
    FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES project_managers(project_id)
);

CREATE TABLE tasks (
    task_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    task_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    task_description TEXT,
    team_id INT REFERENCES team(team_id),
    start_date DATE NOT NULL,
    end_date DATE NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE projects (
    project_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_name TEXT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    manager_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (manager_id) REFERENCES project_managers(manager_id)
);

CREATE TABLE project_team (
    project_id INT,
    member_id INT,
    PRIMARY KEY (project_id, member_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES projects(project_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (member_id) REFERENCES team_members(member_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Projects (
    project_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    project_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    project_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Teams (
    team_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    team_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    team_lead UUID,
    team_members JSONB
)

CREATE TABLE Tasks (
    task_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    task_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    project_id UUID,
    task_description TEXT,
    deadline DATE,
    status VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE Assignments (
    assignment_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    task_id UUID,
    team_id UUID,
    assigned_to UUID,
    assigned_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE Schedule (
    schedule_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    project_id UUID,
    team_id UUID,
    task_id UUID,
    schedule_date DATE
)
